package.name: Avahi
package.descr: Avahi is a system which facilitates host and service discovery in local networks via mDNS (Multicast DNS) and DNS-SD (DNS Service Discovery).

package.name: Cron
package.descr: The cron utility is used to manage commands on a schedule.
